channel.title: iDigital

item.title: After slow 2024, A3 optimistic about robotics sales moving forward

item.title: Lightning AI’s AI Hub shows AI app marketplaces are the next enterprise game-changer
item.description: AI app marketplaces, like Lightning's new AI Hub, bring app access closer to enterprises and makes deployment faster.

item.description: CodeSignal launches AI-powered leadership training platform with voice simulation to democratize soft skills development at scale.

item.title: Not every AI prompt deserves multiple seconds of thinking: how Meta is teaching models to prioritize
item.description: Let models explore different solutions and they will find optimal solutions to properly allocate inference budget to AI reasoning problems.

item.title: Google drops AI weapons ban—what it means for the future of artificial intelligence
item.description: Google sparks debate on big tech's approach to AI safety and raises concerns about responsible tech development in military and surveillance.

item.title: My stepfather’s children told me they plan to buy the house he shares with my mother. I stopped them in their tracks.
item.description: “I discovered that the default deed in Illinois is tenants in common — not joint tenants with the right of survivorship.”

item.title: Unexpectedly dovish Bank of England decision sends pound and yields lower
item.description: The Bank of England on Thursday cut interest rates by a quarter-point, its third reduction since August.
